Trigger.Name: GetPartyMembers Echo (read Description tab when Dalamud is down)
Trigger.Description:
If Dalamud is down, Telesto will not automatically fill the party list. In this case, use this macro after zoning into the instance to manually populate the party list:
/e Player 1: <1> /e Player 2: <2> /e Player 3: <3> /e Player 4: <4> /e Player 5: <5> /e Player 6: <6> /e Player 7: <7> /e Player 8: <8>

Trigger.Name: Reset - "/e _reset" to manually trigger telesto to get party members

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 1 3 safe, lean left. tank B D
B D safe, lean left. tank 2 4
2 4 safe, lean left. tank A C
A C safe, lean left. tank 1 3
2 4 safe, lean right. tank B D
A C safe, lean right. tank 2 4
1 3 safe, lean right. tank A C
B D safe, lean right. tank 1 3

Action.Description: - tanks west and in - party far
- tanks east and out - party close
tanks west and far - party close
tanks east and in - party far
***Double click to edit -> Use Visual Guide for placement***

Action.TextAuraExpression: Test Text Player 1 Player 2 Player 3 Player 4
